summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 28 December to end of Wednesday 29 December GMT
description: Cloud cover and periods of rain on Tuesday. Rain will clear on Wednesday afternoon. Air mass back trajectories indicate  relatively clean air arriving from the Atlantic.   <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates. <br/><br/>With best wishes for the festive period from Imperial ERG.
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
